name: Ninja
description:
🥷 Ninja V1 by Chillpixel

Get hyped for an unforgettable ride through the trendiest Checkpoints and LoRAs of the moment, all jam-packed into a legendary model that's about to blow your mind.

👋 Hey there! I'm Chillpixel, a developer, just diving into the vibrant CivitAI community.

Ninja aims to be the "Greatest Hits" album of CivitAI; bringing together all the absolute best and most popular community resources in one awesome checkpoint.

This epic model is your ticket to exploring the hottest trends and unleashing your creativity like never before. Get ready to level up and dive into the coolest journey yet!

The example images were made using a custom Stable Diffusion pipeline called Ninja Diffusion, available exclusively at DreamWalker. Select Ninja from the model dropdown list — and crank the steps/guidance all the way up — the results are wild.

I really hope you dig my first drop — and if you do, please hit me up with a 5-star review for Ninja!

Companion LoRA

Introducing Elixir, my enhancer LoRA, which helps revitalize antiquated models, infusing them with renewed vitality. While for newer models, it offers a gentle yet discernible enhancement.

Let's Have Fun!

I'm kicking off daily art themes and challenges now:

👉 https://discord.gg/89Pu5ehUvE

modelVersions.name: V1
modelVersions.description:
Ninja V1 aims to be the "Greatest Hits" album of CivitAI; bringing together all the absolute best and most popular community resources in one awesome checkpoint.

You'll get the best results running it at DreamWalker

meta.prompt: RAW photo, full-body, dynamic pose, muscular bearded guy in a shinobi attire, kamishimo, katabira, (light bokeh)++, intricate, (slight (sheen)-)+, elegant, sharp focus, photo by greg rutkowski, soft lighting, vibrant colors, (masterpiece)+, (streets)++, (detailed face)+, futuristic, hightech, scifi, heavy brow, sparkly eyes, stunning, high-definition, ultra HD, 4k resolution, retina display, sharp, crisp, clear, vibrant, XF IQ4, 150MP, 50mm,  ISO 1000, 1/250s, Adobe Lightroom, photolab, Affinity Photo, PhotoDirector 365, marvel universe
